items.sentence: Tom can\'t be old enough to have a daughter as old as Mary.
Can you remember the first time you ate at this restaurant?
Did your mother use to play the piano when she was younger?
This is one of the dictionaries I told you about yesterday.
My brother-in-law would like me to be his son\'s godfather.
My grandmother on my father\'s side has turned one hundred.
Tom has sprained his ankle and won\'t be able to walk home.
Tom hasn\'t been able to eat solid food since his accident.
I didn\'t know we were supposed to help Tom move yesterday.
I heard that Tom didn\'t sing very often when he was a kid.
